definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龍蝦搭扣平安保險方便，並配有加長配飾。

sentences.english: Close the velcro closure and you have the softest pet ever.
sentences.chinese: 關閉維可牢尼龍搭扣，你有最柔軟的寵物永遠。

sentences.english: I let go of her hand and she reached out to touch a pair of shiny black shoes with a strap and silver buckle.
sentences.chinese: 我鬆開她的手，她伸手去夠一雙銀搭扣的光面黑鞋。

sentences.english: One size fits all so for adjustment there is a rear Velcro strap.
sentences.chinese: 一刀切的調整，以便有一個後方尼龍搭扣帶。

sentences.english: Tyrion counted six, oaken chests with iron hasps.
sentences.chinese: 提利昂數出了六個橡木鐵搭扣的箱子。

sentences.english: Quality and style are embedded into ths belt with signature crest logo belt buckle.
sentences.chinese: 這款鑲有飾章徽標的皮帶搭扣集品質與時尚於一身。

sentences.english: And with velcro straps for fast open and close.
sentences.chinese: 與尼龍搭扣帶的快速打開和關閉。

sentences.english: So is velcro a big part of your life?
sentences.chinese: 凱蘭尼龍搭扣是你生活中的一個重要方面嗎？

sentences.english: Lay down the colour for the gold buckle, for this part you need to design the jewelry shape properly.
sentences.chinese: 鋪好黃金搭扣的顏色，這一部要設計好首飾的形狀。

sentences.english: Open the velcro closure and use as a pillow.
sentences.chinese: 打開維可牢尼龍搭扣和使用如一個枕頭。

sentences.english: Simple styles that don't have huge buckles are your best bet.
sentences.chinese: 沒有太多搭扣的簡單款是你最好的選擇。

sentences.english: Stainless steel hasp and 5mm thick toughened safety glass.
sentences.chinese: 不繡鋼搭扣，5mm強化安全玻璃。

sentences.english: A multi-lock hasp shall be used for this purpose.
Each piece has three Velcro disks for attaching the pizza toppings.
sentences.chinese: 每一件有三個尼龍搭扣磁盤上的批薩口味是。

sentences.english: I have a belt of velcro underneath my chin to make the head fit tighter.
sentences.chinese: 我將一條尼龍搭扣裝在下巴下面使獸頭更加合身。

sentences.english: She caught the clasp on her necklace.

definition: hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
